content: page 1� of 6� bamboo summer top designed by nancy ricci yarn 2 2 2 3 skeins of 100% bamboo dk by alexcreates 300 yards per skein notions markers / stitch holders needle size us7 4 5mm 32 circular needles or size to obtain correct gauge gauge 20 sts and 22 row over 4 in stockinette stitch in the round sizes s m l xl s m l xl to fit bust 32-34 36-38 40-42 44-46 finished measurements inches bust 34 37 41 45 length before blocking 19 19 20 5 21 5 length after blocking 22 22 23 5 24 5 to be worn with no ease to -1 negative ease at bust abbreviations bobble bind off ssk slip slip knit st stitch st st stockinette stitch co cast on k knit sts stitches round round k2tog knit two together p purl sl1 slip 1 m1 make 1 psso pass slipped stitch over pm place marker copyright 2018 nancy ricci all rights reserved this pattern may not be reproduced or used for resale without the written permission of the copyright holder page 2� of 6� the bamboo summer top is knitted bottom up and in the round until the armholes once you cast off stitches for the armholes and you divide for front and back you no longer knit in the round instead you knit front and back flat the piece starts at the bottom with 4 repeats of the open double wing stitch which has a multiple of 17 stitches i advise you to place a marker after each 17th stitch this will help you to keep on track after you are done with the lace part you continue in stockinette stitch directions step 1 starting with open double wing stitch co 170 187 204 221 connect in the round being careful not to twist stitches and pm round 1 * k1 yo k3 ssk p5 k2tog k3 yo k1 repeat from * to end of round round 2 * k6 p5 k6 repeat from * to end of round round 3 * k2 yo k3 ssk p3 k2tog k3 yo k2 repeat from * to end of round round 4 * k7 p3 k7 repeat from * to end of round round 5 * k3 yo k3 ssk p1 k2tog k3 yo k3 repeat from * to end of round round 6 * k8 p1 k8 repeat from * to end of round round 7 * k4 yo k3 sl1 k2tog psso k3 yo k4 repeat from * to end of round round 8 k repeat these 8 rounds 4 times in total copyright 2018 nancy ricci all rights reserved this pattern may not be reproduced or used for resale without the written permission of the copyright holder page 3� of 6� step 2 getting ready for long haul of stockinette stitch for m size only next round k1 * k60 k2tog repeat from* to end of round 3 sts decreased 184 sts for xl size only
